UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The Addition of a Synthetic LPS-Targeting Domain Improves Serum Stability While Maintaining Antimicrobial, Antibiofilm, and Cell Stimulating Properties of an Antimicrobial Peptide.
Literature.Author: Maystrenko A, Feng Y, Akhtar N, Li J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:45% Killing=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MBC=2µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MBC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MBC=0.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus pseudintermedius(MBC=0.5µg/ml)
